channel.title: Novation Launchpad First Generation
channel.description:
Hello,
does anybody uses a first generation **Novation Launchpad**? I did a fast test with mine but seems that it is not working (sending or receiving notes) I think it is not a standard plug and play device (as its newer versions), for instance I use a launch control without any problems but finding a way to use it will be very useful.
Thanks in advance, Daniele

item.title: Novation Launchpad First Generation
item.dc:creator: @chaocrator a.k.a. Vimanastaffel
item.description:
@chaocrator wrote:

i suspect that original Launchpads were not class compliant.
the 1st class compliant one was probably Launchpad S.

edit: googling linux related resources shows that i'm probably right, since original launchpads were recognized by linux systems, but did not work, while class compliant devices are working right out of the box.

Read full topic
